original: @111b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @111b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: se danta shr'i yo ga yo gi ni sv'arbh'u ta sam bho gashma sh'a na kalba n'a ma /
analyzed: se danta shr'i yo ga yo gi ni sv'arbh'u ta sam bho gashma sh'a na kalba n'a ma /
translated: śrī-oddiyāna-yoginī-yoginī-svayambhū-sambhoga-śmaśāna-kalpa-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal au rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal au rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious charnel ground of Oddiyāna, the self-arisen enjoyment of the yogins and yoginīs, called The Tantra of the Charnel Ground

original: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the sublime gurus.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the vajra yoginīs.

original: shar gyi dur khrod dbang po gtum drag dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor yug la /
analyzed: shar gyi dur khrod dbang po gtum drag dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor yug la /
translated: In the eastern charnel ground of Caṇḍogra, twelve yojanas in circumference,

original: dpag tshad lnga zheng du gnas pa /
analyzed: dpag tshad lnga zheng du gnas pa /
translated: it is five yojanas wide.

original: @112a * // dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa gsum pa lta bu /
analyzed: @112a * // dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa gsum pa lta bu /
translated: Its shape is like a three-legged cart.

original: gtso bo klu sgrub snying pos byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: gtso bo klu sgrub snying pos byin gyis brlabs //
translated: It is blessed by the principal one, Nāgārjunagarbha.

original: shing ni gser mdog lo ma brgyar gyis shing //
analyzed: shing ni gser mdog lo ma brgyar gyis shing //
translated: The tree is golden-colored with a hundred leaves.

original: zhing skyong dkar po gri thod glang chen gdong //
analyzed: zhing skyong dkar po gri thod glang chen gdong //
translated: The field protector is white, with a sword and skull cup, and has an elephant face.

original: phyogs skyong brgya byin glang chen gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: phyogs skyong brgya byin glang chen gdan rigs bcas //
translated: The directional protector is Indra, with an elephant seat and family.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro pre ta yi dags za //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro pre ta yi dags za //
translated: The Vajra Dakini devours the pretas,

original: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
translated: and the stupa of great enlightenment holds the earth.

original: mtha' yas sngon po'i klu ni 'dud byed cing //
analyzed: mtha' yas sngon po'i klu ni 'dud byed cing //
translated: The naga Ananta, blue, bows down,

original: thod pa brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
analyzed: thod pa brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
translated: and the hut of piled skulls fills everywhere.

original: de na rnal 'byor pa'i rgyal po a'arya de ba la sogs pa shin tu mang ba bzhugs so //
analyzed: de na rnal 'byor pa'i rgyal po a'arya de ba la sogs pa shin tu mang ba bzhugs so //
translated: There dwell the king of yogis, Aryadeva, and many others.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni mdzes ma dang snying stobs can ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni mdzes ma dang snying stobs can ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The yoginis are Sundari, Vira, and so forth.

original: de dag ni rgyud gsang 'dus kyi rjes su 'jug cing klu sgrub yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyud gsang 'dus kyi rjes su 'jug cing klu sgrub yid la byed pa'o //
translated: They follow the Guhyasamaja Tantra and keep Nagarjuna in mind.

original: lho'i dur khrod gshin rje 'bar ba'i nags tshal /
analyzed: lho'i dur khrod gshin rje 'bar ba'i nags tshal /
translated: In the south is the charnel ground of the blazing forest of the Lord of Death,

original: dpag tshad drug cu gnyis khor yug / dpag tshad bco lnga rgyang grags gcig / dbyibs ni 'khor lo 'dra /
analyzed: dpag tshad drug cu gnyis khor yug / dpag tshad bco lnga rgyang grags gcig / dbyibs ni 'khor lo 'dra /
translated: sixty-two yojanas in circumference, fifteen yojanas in size, and shaped like a wheel.

original: dombi he ru ka yis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: dombi he ru ka yis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: It is blessed by Dombi Heruka.

original: bee d'ur+ya mdog lo ma brgyar gyes shing //
analyzed: bee d'ur+ya mdog lo ma brgyar gyes shing //
translated: The color of lapis lazuli, with a hundred leaves,

original: zhing skyong nag po gri thod ma he gdong //
analyzed: zhing skyong nag po gri thod ma he gdong //
translated: the black field protector holds a knife and skull cup and has an ox head.

original: phyogs skyong gshin rje ma he'i gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: phyogs skyong gshin rje ma he'i gdan rigs bcas //
translated: The guardians of the directions, the Lord of Death, and the bull seat, and so forth.

original: rin chen mkha' 'gro kang ka dbang bskur byed //
analyzed: rin chen mkha' 'gro kang ka dbang bskur byed //
translated: The precious dakini, the empowerment of the kank, is performed.

original: cho 'phrul ston pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
analyzed: cho 'phrul ston pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
translated: The stupa that displays miracles holds the earth.

original: dung skyong dkar po'i klu ni 'dud par byed //
analyzed: dung skyong dkar po'i klu ni 'dud par byed //
translated: The white naga Vasuki bows down.

original: thod pa rus pa dum bu'i spyil bus bkang //
analyzed: thod pa rus pa dum bu'i spyil bus bkang //
translated: The skull, bone, and piece hut are filled.

original: rnal 'byor pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang / phyag mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang / phyag mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: The yogis are the avadhuti and so forth.

original: de dag ni gsang 'dus dang / gshin rje gshed nag po'i rjes su 'jug cing dombi he ru ka yid la byed do //
analyzed: de dag ni gsang 'dus dang / gshin rje gshed nag po'i rjes su 'jug cing dombi he ru ka yid la byed do //
translated: They follow the Guhyasamaja and the Black Yamari, and keep in mind the Dombi Heruka.

original: nub kyi dur khrod chu bdag thod pa can dpag tshad bzhi bcu brgyad khor yug la /
analyzed: nub kyi dur khrod chu bdag thod pa can dpag tshad bzhi bcu brgyad khor yug la /
translated: In the western charnel ground, the lord of the waters with a skull, forty-eight yojanas in circumference,

original: dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas /
analyzed: dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas /
translated: twelve yojanas wide,

original: dbyibs ni ban lang spyod lta bu zlum po ste /
analyzed: dbyibs ni ban lang spyod lta bu zlum po ste /
translated: the shape is round like the continent of Godaniya.

original: mkhas pa rta dbyangs kyis ni byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: mkhas pa rta dbyangs kyis ni byin gyis brlabs //
translated: The wise Ashvagosha blessed it.

original: shing ni byi ru'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas //
analyzed: shing ni byi ru'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas //
translated: The tree is the color of coral, with spreading leaves.

original: zhing skyong dmar po gri thod chu srin gdong ;
analyzed: zhing skyong dmar po gri thod chu srin gdong ;
translated: The red field protector, with a knife, skull, and crocodile face,

original: / phyogs skyong chu lha chu srin gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: / phyogs skyong chu lha chu srin gdan rigs bcas //
translated: The guardians of the directions, Varuṇa and his family, are seated on a crocodile.

original: padma mkha' 'gro chos ston kun dha ra //
analyzed: padma mkha' 'gro chos ston kun dha ra //
translated: Padmā, Ḍākinī, Dharmadhara,

original: lha las babs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
analyzed: lha las babs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
translated: and the stūpa of the descent from the gods are on the ground.

original: dmar po dga' bo'i klu rnams 'dud byed cing //
analyzed: dmar po dga' bo'i klu rnams 'dud byed cing //
translated: The red Nāgas, Nanda and so forth, bow down,

original: ro rnams brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
analyzed: ro rnams brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
translated: and the entire place is filled with huts of piled up corpses.

original: de ni rnal 'byor @112b pa ni ku ku ri pa dang / rnal 'byor ma ni snying po'i rgyan ma dang / de dag thams cad ni rgyud sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rjes su 'jug cing slob dpon rta dbyangs yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor @112b pa ni ku ku ri pa dang / rnal 'byor ma ni snying po'i rgyan ma dang / de dag thams cad ni rgyud sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rjes su 'jug cing slob dpon rta dbyangs yid la byed pa'o //
translated: The yogi is Kukkuripa, the yoginī is Hṛdayālaṅkāra, and they are both followers of the Mahāmāyā Tantra and keep the master Aśvaghoṣa in mind.

original: byang gi dur khrod lus ngan 'jigs byed dang // dpag tshad brgyad cu pa khor yug la /
analyzed: byang gi dur khrod lus ngan 'jigs byed dang // dpag tshad brgyad cu pa khor yug la /
translated: The northern charnel ground is called “Fearful Body” and is eighty yojanas in circumference.

original: dpag tshad nyi shu zheng du gnas /
analyzed: dpag tshad nyi shu zheng du gnas /
translated: It is twenty yojanas wide.

original: dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa bzhi pa lta bu /
analyzed: dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa bzhi pa lta bu /
translated: Its shape is like a four-wheeled chariot.

original: slob dpon padma can gyis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: slob dpon padma can gyis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: It is blessed by the master Padmā.

original: ma rgad ljang mdog lo ma brgyar gyis shing //
analyzed: ma rgad ljang mdog lo ma brgyar gyis shing //
translated: The tree is the green mango tree with a hundred leaves.

original: zhing skyong ljang gu gri thod khyu mchog gdong //
analyzed: zhing skyong ljang gu gri thod khyu mchog gdong //
translated: The field-protector is green, with a sword and skull cup, and has the face of a bull.

original: phyogs skyong gnod sbyin khyu mchog gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: phyogs skyong gnod sbyin khyu mchog gdan rigs bcas //
translated: The directional guardian is a yakṣa seated on a bull.

original: las kyi mkha' 'gro las 'byor dam tshig la //
analyzed: las kyi mkha' 'gro las 'byor dam tshig la //
translated: The karma ḍākinī is endowed with the wealth of karma, and

original: bkra shis brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
analyzed: bkra shis brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
translated: the stūpa of the heap of auspiciousness holds the ground.

original: ljang gu karko ta yi klu rab 'dud //
analyzed: ljang gu karko ta yi klu rab 'dud //
translated: The green snake Kārttikeya is greatly bowed to.

original: ro yi spyil bus kun nas bkang ba'i zhing //
analyzed: ro yi spyil bus kun nas bkang ba'i zhing //
translated: The field is filled with a hut of corpses.

original: de na rnal 'byor pa ni bzang po dang / rnal 'byor ma ni brdung ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de na rnal 'byor pa ni bzang po dang / rnal 'byor ma ni brdung ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: There are the yogi Bhadra and the yoginī Bhrāmaṇī and so forth.

original: de dag rgyud dgyes pa rdo rje'i rjes su 'jug cing slob dpon mtsho skyes rjes su dran par byed do //
analyzed: de dag rgyud dgyes pa rdo rje'i rjes su 'jug cing slob dpon mtsho skyes rjes su dran par byed do //
translated: They follow the tantra of the Hevajra Tantra and remember the master Padmākara.

original: shar lho'i dur khrod me mtshams dpal 'dren dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor yug la /
analyzed: shar lho'i dur khrod me mtshams dpal 'dren dpag tshad bcu gnyis khor yug la /
translated: In the charnel ground of the southeast, the glorious guide of the intermediate directions, twelve yojanas in circumference,

original: dpag tshad gsum ni zheng du gnas /
analyzed: dpag tshad gsum ni zheng du gnas /
translated: is three yojanas wide.

original: dbyibs ni skyes pa gzhon nu'i lag mthil lta bu ste /
analyzed: dbyibs ni skyes pa gzhon nu'i lag mthil lta bu ste /
translated: Its shape is like the palm of a young man's hand.

original: gtso bo sa ra ha yis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: gtso bo sa ra ha yis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: It is blessed by the principal Saraha.

original: shing ni aa mra'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas //🔽zhing skyong ser po gri thod ra skyes gdong //
analyzed: shing ni aa mra'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas // zhing skyong ser po gri thod ra skyes gdong //
translated: The tree is the color of a mango, with spreading leaves.🔽The field protector is yellow, with a face like a goat, holding a sword and skull cup.

original: phyogs skyong me lha ra skyes gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: phyogs skyong me lha ra skyes gdan rigs bcas //
translated: The directional protector Agni has a face like a goat, with a family.

original: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ro langs sbyin sreg byed //
analyzed: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ro langs sbyin sreg byed //
translated: The various dakinis perform the burnt offering of the vetala.

original: padma spungs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
analyzed: padma spungs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
translated: The earth is held by the stupa of a heap of lotuses.

original: dkar po padma chen po'i klu rab 'dud //
analyzed: dkar po padma chen po'i klu rab 'dud //
translated: The white great lotus naga is greatly bowed to.

original: yi dags ro yi spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
analyzed: yi dags ro yi spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
translated: The entire place is filled with the huts of vetala ghosts.

original: de na rnal 'byor pa ni ghu na ka na ka dang / rnal 'byor ma ni padma rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de na rnal 'byor pa ni ghu na ka na ka dang / rnal 'byor ma ni padma rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: There the yogi is Gunakara, and the yogini is Padmavajra and so forth.

original: de dag ni rgyud bde mchog 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal sa ra ha pa rjes su dran par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyud bde mchog 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal sa ra ha pa rjes su dran par byed pa'o //
translated: They follow the Cakrasaṃvara Tantra and recall the glorious Saraha.

original: lho nub kyi dur khrod dbang ldan ha ha sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad drug khor yug la /
analyzed: lho nub kyi dur khrod dbang ldan ha ha sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad drug khor yug la /
translated: In the southwest, the charnel ground of Iśāna, called Ha ha roar, is six yojanas in circumference.

original: dpag tshad bzhi ni zheng du gnas /
analyzed: dpag tshad bzhi ni zheng du gnas /
translated: It is four yojanas wide.

original: dbyibs ni padma dkar po kha bye ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: dbyibs ni padma dkar po kha bye ba lta bu ste /
translated: Its shape is like an open white lotus.

original: dpal mchog nag po zhabs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: dpal mchog nag po zhabs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: Blessed by the glorious Kṛiṣhṇācārya.

original: aindra n'i la'i shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
analyzed: aindra n'i la'i shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
translated: The indranīla tree has full leaves.

original: zhing skyong nag po gri @113a * //
analyzed: zhing skyong nag po gri @113a * //
translated: The field protector is black,

original: thod mi yi gdong //🔽phyogs skyong srin po yi dags gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: thod mi yi gdong // phyogs skyong srin po yi dags gdan rigs bcas //
translated: with a human face and a skull-cup.🔽The direction protectors are rākṣasas and pretas, each with their own seats.

original: dam tshig mkha' 'gro kyang rnams nye bar ston //
analyzed: dam tshig mkha' 'gro kyang rnams nye bar ston //
translated: The samaya ḍākinīs are also present.

original: bdud 'dul chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
analyzed: bdud 'dul chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
translated: The great demon-taming stūpa holds the ground.

original: gzi can dkar dmar mdog can klu rab 'dud //
analyzed: gzi can dkar dmar mdog can klu rab 'dud //
translated: The powerful ones with white and red complexions are greatly revered by the nāgas.

original: keng rus yi dags lo ma'i spyil bus gang //
analyzed: keng rus yi dags lo ma'i spyil bus gang //
translated: The place is filled with skeletons and leaf-huts of pretas.

original: de na rnal 'byor pa ni bram ze stobs can gyi bu rnal 'byor pa gser mdog can dang / rnal 'byor ma ni bzhin khro ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de na rnal 'byor pa ni bram ze stobs can gyi bu rnal 'byor pa gser mdog can dang / rnal 'byor ma ni bzhin khro ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: There, the yogi is the son of the powerful brahmin, the yogi Suvarṇakā, and the yoginī is Krodhabhaṇḍā and so forth.

original: de dag ni rgyud snying po gnyis dang / rta mchog gi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug cing dpal nag po zhabs rjes su dran par byed do //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyud snying po gnyis dang / rta mchog gi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug cing dpal nag po zhabs rjes su dran par byed do //
translated: They follow the two essence tantras and the Tantra of the Supreme Horse, and they remember the glorious Kṛiṣhṇācārya.

original: nub byang dur khrod bden bral mun chen zhes pa dpag tshad bcu bzhi pa khor yug la /
analyzed: nub byang dur khrod bden bral mun chen zhes pa dpag tshad bcu bzhi pa khor yug la /
translated: In the northwest, the charnel ground of the god of obstacles, Great Darkness, is fourteen leagues in circumference.

original: dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas /
analyzed: dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas /
translated: It is twelve leagues wide.

original: dbyibs ni chu'i ri mo 'khyil ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: dbyibs ni chu'i ri mo 'khyil ba lta bu ste /
translated: Its shape is like a swirling water design.

original: mkhas pa ku ku ri pas byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: mkhas pa ku ku ri pas byin gyis brlabs //
translated: The master Kukuripa blessed it.

original: shel gyi mdog can shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
analyzed: shel gyi mdog can shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
translated: The trees are the color of crystal, with full foliage.🔽The field guardians are blue, with knives, skulls, and meat-colored skin,

original: zhing skyong sngon po gri thod sha ba'i mdog / phyogs skyong rlung lha sha ba'i gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: zhing skyong sngon po gri thod sha ba'i mdog / phyogs skyong rlung lha sha ba'i gdan rigs bcas //
translated: and the directional guardians are the wind gods, with meat-colored seats.

original: thams cad mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i chos ston cing //
analyzed: thams cad mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i chos ston cing //
translated: All of them teach the secret dharma of the dakinis.

original: gtsug phud dag pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
analyzed: gtsug phud dag pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //
translated: The earth is held by pure uṣṇīṣa stūpas.

original: padma dkar po'i klu ni rab tu 'dud //
analyzed: padma dkar po'i klu ni rab tu 'dud //
translated: The nāgas of the white lotus are very subdued.

original: rtsva spyil rus pa'i rgyan spras kyis gang zhing //
analyzed: rtsva spyil rus pa'i rgyan spras kyis gang zhing //
translated: It is filled with grass huts and those adorned with bone ornaments.

original: de na rnal 'byor pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma ni zhing la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de na rnal 'byor pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma ni zhing la sogs pa'o //
translated: There, the yogis are stream-enterers, and the yoginis are the fields, and so on.

original: de dag ni rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal ku ku ri rjes su dran par byed do //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal ku ku ri rjes su dran par byed do //
translated: They follow the Yoginī Tantra and recall the glorious Kukkurīpā.

original: byang shar gyi dur khrod rlung du ca co sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad nyi shu khor yug la /
analyzed: byang shar gyi dur khrod rlung du ca co sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad nyi shu khor yug la /
translated: In the northeast, in the cemetery of the Wind, called “Howling,” with a circumference of twenty leagues,

original: dpag chad lnga ni zheng du gnas /
analyzed: dpag chad lnga ni zheng du gnas /
translated: it is five leagues wide.

original: dbyibs ni dge slong gi lhung bzed lta bu ste /
analyzed: dbyibs ni dge slong gi lhung bzed lta bu ste /
translated: Its shape is like a monk’s alms bowl.

original: mkha' 'gro rdo rje phag mos byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro rdo rje phag mos byin gyis brlabs //
translated: It is blessed by the ḍākinī Vajravārāhī.

original: rin chen dung mdog shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
analyzed: rin chen dung mdog shing ni lo 'dab rgyas //
translated: The tree is a jewel-like conch, with full leaves.

original: zhing skyong dkar sham gri thod rta yi gdong //
analyzed: zhing skyong dkar sham gri thod rta yi gdong //
translated: The field protector is white, with a skull cup and flaying knife, and a horse’s face.

original: phyogs skyong 'byung po rta yi gdan rigs bcas //
analyzed: phyogs skyong 'byung po rta yi gdan rigs bcas //
translated: The directional guardians and bhūtas have horse-faced seats.

original: 'jig rten mkha' 'gro bskyod cing gtor ma 'dzin //
analyzed: 'jig rten mkha' 'gro bskyod cing gtor ma 'dzin //
translated: The worldly ḍākinīs move and hold the bali offering.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin //🔽nor 'dzin na ros mdog can klu rab 'dud //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin // nor 'dzin na ros mdog can klu rab 'dud //
translated: The earth is held by the stūpa of the wheel of Dharma.🔽The nāgas bow down to the one with the color of saffron.

original: so phag ba rtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
analyzed: so phag ba rtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing //
translated: The place is filled with huts of stacked bricks.

original: de na rnal 'byor pa ni dpal he ru ka pa dang / rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma dang bdud rtsi ma la sogs @113b pa'o ;
analyzed: de na rnal 'byor pa ni dpal he ru ka pa dang / rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma dang bdud rtsi ma la sogs @113b pa'o ;
translated: The yogis are Śrī Heruka and the yoginīs are Nairātmya, Amṛtā, and so forth.

original: / de ni rgyud m'a h'a m'a ya nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rdo rje phag mo rjes su dran par byed do //
analyzed: / de ni rgyud m'a h'a m'a ya nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su 'jug cing rdo rje phag mo rjes su dran par byed do //
translated: They follow the Tantra of the Great Illusion, which is equal to space, and they recollect Vajravārāhī.

original: dpal au rgyan gyi rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal au rgyan gyi rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Self-Arisen Enjoyment of the Glorious Oḍḍiyāna Yogis and Yoginīs, the Chapter on the Charnel Ground

original: slob dpon birla  pas mdzad pa las btus pa /
analyzed: slob dpon birla  pas mdzad pa las btus pa /
translated: Extracted from the work of Master Virūpa

original: rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'irtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
translated: Translated by the yogi Prajñāśrījñānakīrti.
